topic.title: How to Use a Local Font in WebHelp Responsive Output

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: It is possible to use a local fonts in WebHelp Responsive output by copying the local font file to the output directory through a Publishing Template and referencing the font files using font-face rules within a custom CSS.
